title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 102.6 - Notice for establishment of an office performing limited administrative functions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 102.6 - Notice for establishment of an office performing limited administrative functions

State Regulations

The notice required by section
2.7
of Supervisory Policy FB 2 for
establishing an office performing limited administrative functions shall
contain the following information: (a) the name and address of the foreign banking corporation; (b) the location in New York of the office
performing limited administrative functions and the office(s) of the bank for
which the New York office is performing the limited administrative
functions; (c) the activities of
the New York office; (d) a
description of the staffing of the New York office; and
(e) any additional material as requested by
the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
102.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
